T02D3014:65b-0: @65b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal la //
T02D3014:65b-1: lce'i dbang po nyams shing na ba gso bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
T02D3014:65b-2: gos gsar pa gon te smyung bar gnas par byas
T02D3014:65b-3: la khrus kyi cho ga lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
T02D3014:65b-4: byas te / de nas rang nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te /
T02D3014:65b-5: snying ga'i sa bon las 'od snga ma ltar lan gsum du 'phags pa mchod pa dang /
T02D3014:65b-6: sems can gyi don byas pa'i gzhug la ro'i lha
T02D3014:65b-7: mo 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ro
T02D3014:65b-8: sna tshogs 'dzin pa rnams bdag nyid kyi lce la
T02D3014:65b-9: thim pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ljags ring zhing
T02D3014:65b-10: yangs pa ye shes 'dus pa las byung ba /
T02D3014:65b-11: mkhyen pa ma 'gags par gsal bar dmigs shing snying po rgyas bsdus ci rigs par bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D3014:65b-12: de ltar yang skrangs pa rnams la rgya tshal bzlas pa bya ste byug go //
T02D3014:65b-13: brda mi shes pa rnams la shing kun la bzlas so//
T02D3014:66a-0: @66a * // tsha zhing zug dang ldan pa rnams la 'bras bu
T02D3014:66a-1: gsum gyi khu ba dang ga pur gyi chu la
T02D3014:66a-2: bzlas so // grang zhing ser ka dang ldan pa
T02D3014:66a-3: rnams la tsha ba gsum dang tsandan gyi chu la
T02D3014:66a-4: bzlas so // bzlas so // lce'i dbang po nyams
T02D3014:66a-5: pa gso ba'i cho ga padma rgyas ba zhes bya
